code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Routes,Route}from'react-router-dom';import About from'./pages/About';import Products from'./pages/Products';import{ToastProvider}from'./components/UI/ToastContext';import'./styles/global.css';import'./styles/home.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[theme,setTheme]=useState('dark');useEffect(()=>{const savedTheme=localStorage.getItem('AxionLabsTheme');if(savedTheme==='light'){setTheme('light');document.body.classList.add('light-theme');}},[]);const toggleTheme=()=>{const newTheme=theme==='dark'?'light':'dark';setTheme(newTheme);if(newTheme==='light'){document.body.classList.add('light-theme');localStorage.setItem('AxionLabsTheme','light');}else{document.body.classList.remove('light-theme');localStorage.setItem('AxionLabsTheme','dark');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ToastProvider,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Router,{basename:process.env.NODE_ENV==='production'?'/AxionLabs':'',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"app",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(About,{theme:theme,toggleTheme:toggleTheme})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/products",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Products,{theme:theme,toggleTheme:toggleTheme})})]})})})});}export default App;
